author: Anonymous Poet
title: Use of abstraction in Q6 Problem Set 7
question: Are we allowed to use abstract functions or make a separate abstract function for functions that operate on mutual recursion for Q6? I ask this because I understand problem sets assess your understanding of concepts from weeks prior, but we only learned abstract this week.
instructor_answer:
Problem set 7 is not intended for use of abstract functions. 
I'm not sure I understand what you are asking exactly.
Are you asking whether it is OK to convert the body of one of the functions in a multi-function template into a call to an abstract function?
Or are you asking whether it is OK to write the contents of a 2-one-of-table cell (a cond answer) using an abstract function?
In general the answer to both questions is yes, but usually when we give you a multi-function template to work with we are expecting you not to replace the function bodies with calls to abstract functions?
Did I understand your question properly?
